net.edzard.kinetic

Class Stage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • net.edzard.kinetic.Node
        • net.edzard.kinetic.Container
          • net.edzard.kinetic.Stage

  • public class Stage
extends Container
    Central class for drawing with Kinetic. The stage contains everything that is drawn. It consists of layers, which in turn contain the shapes.
    Author:
    Ed
    See Also:
    Layer

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public final void add(Layer layer)
        Add a new layer to the stage.
        Parameters:
        layer - The new layer

      • clear

        public final void clear()
        Clears the stage. All layers are cleared.

      • drawHit

        public final void drawHit()
        Draws the hit graphs of contained layers.

      • start

        public final void start()
        Starts any animation on this stage.

      • stop

        public final void stop()
        Stops any animation on this stage.

      • getPointerPosition

        public final Vector2d getPointerPosition()
        Retrieve the user position. This is either a mouse or a touch position.
        Returns:
        The last user position

      • getIntersections

        public final java.util.List<Shape> getIntersections(Vector2d position)
        Get all shapes that intersect with a given point. This works across layers
        Parameters:
        position - Position to check
        Returns:
        A list of shapes

      • toDataURL

        public final void toDataURL(Stage.DataUrlTarget callback)
        Retrieve a URL to the stage's data. The data url will refer to a PNG image The data url will be passed by means of a callback
        Parameters:
        callback - A callback handler that will receive the data url

      • getThrottle

        public final int getThrottle()
        Retrieves the throttle value for animations on this stage object. The throttle value influences how often drawing operations are executed.
        Returns:
        The throttle value in milliseconds.

      • setThrottle

        public final void setThrottle(int throttle)
        Assign a throttle value for animation on this stage object. The throttle value influences how often drawing operations are executed.
        Parameters:
        throttle - The throttle value in milliseconds.
